name: github-api-get-latest-prs
title: Get latest merged PRs with GitHub APIs
shortDescription: Get a report from the last 2 weeks, useful for maintainers who regularly have contributions and want to see a summary of recent activity.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Get latest PRs with Github APIs

references.name: Want to learn more about GitHub APIs
references.description: Check out the GitHub API documentation to get started and for the reference to the endpoints.
